peptide.cite: Please cite Norine: a database of nonribosomal peptide, Caboche et Al., Nucleic Acids Research 2008; 36:D326-D331

general.name: coronatine
general.comment: Coronatine contributes to virulence in several host-pathogen interactions and elicits diffuse chlorosis in a wide variety of plant species and also induces hypertrophy, inhibits root elongation, and stimulates ethylene production.
